import React from 'react' import Logo from '../../images/Habit-logo.png' import './login.css' import userIcon from '../../images/user-icon.png' import passwordIcon from "../../images/password-icon.png" import facebookIcon from '../../images/facebook-icon.png' import twitterIcon from '../../images/twitter-icon.png' import { useLogin } from '../../hooks/useLogin' import { useState } from 'react' const Login = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const handleChange= (event)=>{ const value = event.target.value console.log(event.target.value) if(event.target.className === 'username'){ setUsername(value) } if(event.target.className === "password"){ setPassword(value) } } return (
handleChange(event)} />
handleChange(event)} />
Forgot password?
) } export default Login {/*
awesome logo
Lost your password ?
*/}
